About Me

I am a master's student @KAIST WSP Lab. My primary research interests lie in various attacks and defenses against web sites providing privacy-sensitive services. In particular, I am interested in securing web services by leveraging machine learning.

Education

Mar. 2022 - M.S., Graduate School of Information Security, KAIST (Advisor: Sooel Son)
Mar. 2018 - Feb. 2022 B.S., Cyber Security, Ajou University
